trans-unit.source: Provides core services of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)] to manage and display user annotations.
trans-unit.target: Fornece serviços principais do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_caf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-caf-md.md)] para gerir e apresentar anotações do utilizador.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> class for use with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> classe para utilização com uma determinada <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The document reading control associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O documento ler controlo associado a <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> class for use with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> classe para utilização com uma determinada <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The document viewing control associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O documento de visualização do controlo associado a <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: viewer is .
trans-unit.target: vieweris .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> class for use with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> classe para utilização com uma determinada <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be used with <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived controls: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>
trans-unit.target: Este construtor pode ser utilizado com <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>derivada controlos:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer></xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>

trans-unit.source: The document viewing control associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O documento de visualização do controlo associado a <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: viewer is .
trans-unit.target: vieweris .

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to clear highlight annotations from the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Representa o comando para limpar realçar anotações da seleção atual.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to create a highlight annotation on the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Representa o comando para criar uma anotação de realce na seleção atual.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to create an ink-note annotation on the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Representa o comando para criar uma anotação de nota de tinta digital na seleção atual.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to create a text-note annotation on the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Representa o comando para criar uma anotação de nota de texto na seleção atual.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to delete all ink-note, text-note, and highlight annotations in the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Representa o comando para eliminar todas as nota de tinta digital, nota de texto e realce anotações na seleção atual.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to delete all ink-note and text-note annotations in the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Representa o comando para eliminar todas as anotações de nota de tinta digital e nota de texto na seleção atual.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Disables annotations processing and hides all visible annotations.
trans-unit.target: Desativa o anotações de processamento e oculta a todas as anotações visível.

trans-unit.source: When Disable is called all annotations become hidden.
trans-unit.target: Quando é chamado desativar todas as anotações fiquem oculta.

trans-unit.source: Enables the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> for use with a given <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> and displays all visible annotations.
trans-unit.target: Permite a <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> para utilização com um determinado <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref> e apresenta todas as anotações visível.

trans-unit.source: When Enable is called all annotations in the viewer control window are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Quando é chamado ativar todas as anotações na janela de controlo do Visualizador são apresentadas.

trans-unit.source: (The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.)
trans-unit.target: (O controlo do visualizador associado ao serviço de anotação está especificado no parâmetro para o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>construtor.)</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The annotation store to use for reading, writing, and displaying annotations.
trans-unit.target: O arquivo de uma anotação a utilizar para ler, escrever e apresentar anotações.

trans-unit.source: annotationStore is .
trans-unit.target: annotationStoreis .

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> associated with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> associado um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A>método pode ser utilizado para devolver o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>associados com o seguinte documento controlos de visualização:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>derivada subclasses - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>o controlo do visualizador associado ao serviço de anotação está especificado no parâmetro para o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A>

trans-unit.source: The document reader control to return the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> instance for.
trans-unit.target: O controlo de leitor de documentos para devolver o <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> instância para.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> associated with the given document reader control; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the specified document reader has no <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> associada ao controlo de leitor documento fornecido; ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o leitor de documento especificado não tem <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: reader is .
trans-unit.target: readeris .

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> associated with a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> associado um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A>método pode ser utilizado para devolver o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>associados com o seguinte documento controlos de visualização:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>derivada subclasses - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>o controlo do visualizador associado ao serviço de anotação está especificado no parâmetro para o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A>

trans-unit.source: The document viewer control to return the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> instance for.
trans-unit.target: O controlo do Visualizador de documentos para devolver o <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> instância para.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> associated with the given document viewer control; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the specified viewer control has no <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> associadas com o controlo do Visualizador do documento fornecido; ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o controlo do Visualizador especificado não tem <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: viewer is .
trans-unit.target: vieweris .

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> instance associated with a specified document viewing control.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> instância associada um documento especificado visualização de controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A>método pode ser utilizado para devolver o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>associados com o seguinte documento controlos de visualização:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase>derivada subclasses - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer>o controlo do visualizador associado ao serviço de anotação está especificado no parâmetro para o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A>

trans-unit.source: The document viewing control to return the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> instance for.
trans-unit.target: O documento de visualização de controlo para devolver o <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> instância para.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> associated with the given document viewing control; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the specified document viewing control has no <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> associadas com o documento fornecido a visualização de controlo; ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o documento especificado visualização de controlo não tenha <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: viewer is .
trans-unit.target: vieweris .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> está ativada.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref> is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref> está ativada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> used by this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"> </xref> utilizado por este <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> used by the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> is specified as a parameter in the service's <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>utilizado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>está especificado como um parâmetro do serviço <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> used by this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore"></xref> used by this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService"></xref>.
